pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-5380: datahubCreatedByStep is now set correctly
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Checklist:
- Note: do not change the below


Owner:


 JIRA_ID included in all the commit messages


 PR title is in the format JIRA_ID:Title


 Rebase the branch with upstream


 Squashed all commits into a single commit


 Added Tests


Reviewer:


 Reviewed Tests

commit.message: DHFPROD-5380: datahubCreatedByStep is now set correctly

nodes.bodyText: This test wasn't really testing the function, because it was passing in values - one of which was incorrect (the stepDefinitionName). I reworked the test to instead verify the interesting logic, which is that each bit is overwritten except for jobId.
